document_data.name: The Great Diaspora of Netheril
document_data.mainbody:
'''''The Great Diaspora of Netheril''''' was a book that covered the spread of the [[Netherese]] people during the years of the ancient empire of [[Netheril]]. It was a lengthy tome.{{Cite dungeon/170/Monument of the Ancients|79}}
{{quote|The [[arcanist]] [[Barze (person)|Barze]] then led his persecuted flock away from [[Negarath]] Enclave, traveling on foot for many months beyond the eastern frontier of Netheril. As [[Alaphaer]]'s first snows began to fall, the beleaguered exiles came upon a fertile dale sheltered by two great mountain ranges. There Barze founded his [[Barze|self-titled kingdom]], and for a time the war-weary archwizard knew true happiness.|Excerpt from Chapter Seven: Year of Hostile Badgers ({{Yearlink|-457}})}}
